title: 155: The Truth About Steroids
description: Are steroids a guaranteed ticket to more strength and muscle gains? Are they the key to getting a body like your favorite bodybuilder or physique competitor? Will they improve your performance so that you can run with the big boys? Sal, Adam and Justin reveal what steroids can and cannot do in this candid episode. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpradio.com
